text: Anɨb agɨl, kɨlop agyokɨlak. Am am Ponisiya plopens nab ak amɨlɨg, binɨb Jisas nop gos nɨgɨlak okok kɨlop agɨlak, Man okok binɨb Juda mel okok abe, kɨli tap tɨmel kelɨgɨl Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgebal agɨlak. Anɨb agelak, kɨlop tep gak. Ponisiya plopens anɨb ak kelɨgɨl, Samaliya plopens amɨl, kɨlop takaw anɨb ak tek nep agelak, kɨli abe nɨgel tep gak.
